records.Name: Super Vanilla Syrup
records.Description: With a rich vanilla flavor and an aromatic taste profile, the Super Vanilla blend offers a taste of Madagascar Vanilla with notes of brown sugar.

records.Name: Salted Caramel Syrup
records.Description: Sweet and then salty. This syrup has a rich buttery caramel kick.

records.Name: Black Cherry Syrup
records.Description: The perfect balance of sweet and tart that only ripe cherries can deliver.

records.Name: Peach Syrup
records.Description: Fresh, ripe aromatics and a flavor profile that's peachy-keen.
